general.2: TikTok is BANNED. (Making fun of it is highly encouraged)
general.3: Have a good username that is easily typeable.
general.5: Use common sense. Don't abuse loopholes just because they aren't specifically listed in the rules.

discord.1: Refrain from consistently spamming. This includes pings.
discord.2: Minimize the amount of bots in the server.
discord.3: Talk and use commands in the correct channels.
discord.4: Make voting fair. Don't ask somebody to vote what you want **if they don't know what is going on**

minecraft.1: To be whitelisted, you must be a part of this Discord server.
minecraft.4: No hacked accounts (including those from alt stores)
minecraft.5: Do not do anything that could cause someone to lose items/builds. (Death traps, etc.)
minecraft.7: No griefing. If you accidently break a build (especially farms), repair it as soon as possible.
minecraft.9: The only duping allowed is sand, tnt, dragon egg and carpet

music.1: No playing loud music unless all people in voice chat agree on it.
music.2: Don't play troll audios if someone in the voice channel is actually listening to music.
music.3: Don't (force) skip others' songs unless they approve or it is clear they played it as a joke.

punishment.1: People will be punished by either a demote or ban.
punishment.2: Discord: they will be demoted down to <@&762337515528912896>. If they already are one, they will be banned for 24 hours. Ban period may be extended to up to a week if needed.
punishment.3: On Minecraft, it will be a of ban up to 2 weeks.
